page_title: Master of Engineering (Telecommunication and Network Engineering) - Plan MC234
text: ENG1114 | City Campus Masters Research Project | 48 | OENG1088 | City Campus Masters Research Project Part 1 | 24 | OENG1089 | City Campus Masters Research Project Part 2 | 24 | OENG1090 | City Campus CRICOS code: 079936K To graduate you must complete the following.
